'''Taste of Warmth''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with Taste of Warmth opens the [[Cooking]] menu.

One copy of Taste of Warmth can be obtained by talking to [[Arapacati]] after completing {{Quest|"Hello," "Thank You," and the Final "Goodbye"}}.
